trans-unit.source: Gets the section group information for the networking namespaces.
This class cannot be inherited.

This class corresponds to the [\<system.Net\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/system-net-element-network-settings.md) configuration element described in the [Network Settings Schema](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f1de5a0f-76c5-4833-819f-5222b8146340) documentation.
This section group controls configuration settings for the following namespaces:
This class provides programmatic access to information that can be stored in configuration files.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.NetSectionGroup"></xref> class.
This constructor does nothing.
Gets the configuration section containing the authentication modules registered for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<authenticationModules\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/authenticationmodules-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.AuthenticationModulesSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the connection management settings for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<connectionManagement\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/connectionmanagement-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.ConnectionManagementSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the default Web proxy server settings for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<defaultProxy\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/defaultproxy-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.DefaultProxySection"></xref> object.
Gets the `System.Net` configuration section group from the specified configuration file.
Use this method to extract the network settings from a configuration file.
A <xref href="System.Configuration.Configuration"></xref> that represents a configuration file.
A that represents the `System.Net` settings in config.
Gets the configuration section containing the SMTP client e-mail settings for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<mailSettings\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/mailsettings-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.MailSettingsSectionGroup"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the cache configuration settings for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<requestCaching\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/requestcaching-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.RequestCachingSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the network settings for the local computer.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<settings\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/settings-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.SettingsSection"></xref> object.
Gets the configuration section containing the modules registered for use with the <xref href="System.Net.WebRequest"></xref> class.

The section returned by this property corresponds to the [\<webRequestModules\> Element (Network Settings)](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/network/webrequestmodules-element-network-settings.md) configuration element.
A <xref href="System.Net.Configuration.WebRequestModulesSection"></xref> object.
